General.Name: MOJ S.A
General.Description: MOJ S.A. offers industrial couplings, drilling equipment, and small mechanization devices for the mining industry. The company provides hydrokinetic, flexible, pin, finger, tire, tooth, and rigid couplings, and clutch assemblies; and handheld devices, such as drills, anchor bolters, saws, hammers, pullers, and torque multipliers with hydraulic, pneumatic, and electric drives, as well as hand and torque wrenches. It also offers individual housing; aggregates; submersible dewatering pump; auxiliary drives; hydraulic cylinders; special chains; and clutches, including fluid, spring, and gear couplings, and electro-hydraulic brakes. MOJ S.A. was founded in 1913 and is based in Katowice, Poland.

1.Name: Mr. Przemyslaw  Biskup
